document.full_text: chris paine, whose 2006 documentary "who killed the electric car?" blamed general motors for aborting its ev1 electric-vehicle program, has returned with "revenge of the electric car."
document.title: the electric car's future
lines_and_colors: chris paine, whose 2006 documentary "who killed the electric car?" blamed general motors for aborting its ev1 electric-vehicle program, has returned with "revenge of the electric car."
